Tube

Base class of all functions

Tube is a really cool module.

Tube

Base class of AirQuant

class tube.Tube

Bases: handle

AirwayImageAll()

Traverse all airway segments except the trachea.

ArcLengths = None

corresponding arclength measurement traversed slices

CTDimRed = None

original Image

CaseDir = None

director for case

ComputeBranchCharacteristics()

Add parent and child links, and calculate length of airways. Save these to class to keep track of airway characteristics.

ComputeDmapD(CT_point)

Convert CT_point mm back to voxel ind

ComputeEllipses(FWHM_points)

Perform the Ellipitcal fitting The output will be sturct containing the major and minor lengths as well as all the stop points

ComputeIntegratedVol(prunelength, idx)

Compute the intertapering value for all airways based on integrated volume along airway.

ComputeIntegratedVolAll(prunelength)

Compute the intertapering value for all airways based on integrated volume along airway.

ComputeInterIntegratedVol(prunelength)

Compute the intertapering value for all airways based on integrated volume along airway.

ComputeIntraTaper(prunelength, idx, plotflag)

prunelength given as a 2 element vector, the length in mm to ignore at the begining and end of the branch.

ComputeLobarInterTaper(prunelength)

TODO: great potential for improving efficiency. Compare every lobar airway with the diameter of the first airway of that lobe.

Based on original function by Kin Quan 2018 * interperate real point on spline

ComputeSpline(link_index)

Computes a smooth spline of a single graph edge. Based on original function by Kin Quan 2018

  • Compute Spline if necessary

get list of terminal branches

La = Arclengths; Le = Euclidean lengths

CreateAirwayImage(link_index)

Constructs perpendicular images as if travelling along an airway segment in CT image and Segmentation.

Characteristics of tube

FindFWHMall()

displacement from originating branch

GetAreas()

Extract the inner area of all branches from FWHM results and output

GetDiameters()

Extract the inner area of all branches from FWHM results, convert to diameter and output.

GraphPlotIT()

graph plot for plotting intertapering relative to edgethicknes.

InterpolateCT(normal, CT_point, plane_sz, plane_sample_sz)

Interpolates a CT plane of the image. Based on original function by Kin Quan 2018

LobeAvgPlot(metric)

visualise average of each generation across upper and lower lobes for intra/inter/avg values.

static LobeLabels()

returns cell of lobe lables used in AirQuant

OrthoViewAirway(link_index)

View a series of an airway segment’s slices as a volume image stack using MATLAB’s inbuilt othogonal 3d viewer.

ParentNode = None

Graph Properties

PlotAirway(link_index, slide)

display image

PlotAirway3(link_index)

Plot resampled airway slices overlayed with FWHMesl ray cast points and fitted ellipse

PlotMap3D(mode)

Recommend to use View3D if colour labels appear buggy.

PlotSeg()

plot segmentation

PlotSegSkel()

plot segmentation and skeleton within each other.

PlotSplineTree()

loop through every branch, check spline has already been computed, compute if necessary. Skip trachea. Plot spline. TODO: This may not work as well when VoxelSize ~= [1,1,1]

PlotSplineVecs(subsamp, link_index)

Plot and Visualise tangental vectors off spline sample points. 1/subsamp = proportion of spline points to sample, default subsamp = 2. link_index = airway indices to plot, default link_index = all.

PlotTree(gen, show_seg_txt, show_node_txt)

Plot the airway tree with nodes and links in image space. Set gen to the maximum number of generations to show. Original Function by Ashkan Pakzad on 27th July 2019.

Raycast(interpslice, interpseg, center)

  • Compute Rays

Getting the range limit of the ray which will be the shortest distance from the centre to the bounadry Need to find the limits of the raw

ReformatAirway(link_index, slice_idx)

get reformatted airway stack

e.g. lobe

SavePath = None

SegIndices = None

indices of voxels made up by segmentation

SegmentTaperAll(prunelength)

high level function to compute the segmental tapering measurement of all airways.

SetBranch(ParentNode, ChildNode, IgnoredLink)

Set branch characteristics

SetCT(CTDimRed, VoxDim)

CTDimRed - 6 element vector of top left to bottom right extremes of CT image VoxDim - 3 element vector of voxel dimensions of CT in mm.

SetGraphLobeColourmap(h, G)

set the colours of a network graph by lobe. G is the graph object and h is the plot. i.e. h = plot(G)

SetSegSkel(SegIndices, SkelIndices)

Each is a vector of linear indices in the frame of the reduced CT.

SkelIndices = None

indices of voxels made up by skeletonisation

Specs = None

Store of end metrics

requires lobe classification

View3D(mode)

View segmentation volume with different labels. In MATLAB’s volviewer. mode = ‘TaperGradient’, ‘generation’, ‘lobes’

VoxDim = None

voxel dimensions in mm usually

airwaystack(link_index)

generate an airway’s interpolated slices into an array stack.

compareextent(populationstats, threshold)

threshold = minimum gen expected populationstats = table generated by summarising results from genperlobe over several images.

exportraw(savename)

export Glink table and arclengths and inner diameter measurements

extentstats()

make table of lobes

plot(type)

Default plot is a graph network representation. Optional input is to provide a list of edge labels indexed by the Glink property.

plot3(gen, show_node_txt)

Plot the airway tree in graph form, in 3D. nodes are in in image space. Set gen to the maximum number of generations to show. Original Function by Ashkan Pakzad on 27th July 2019.

vol3daxes(ax)

utility function for 3D volumetric plotting. Sets the aspect ratio according to voxel size and reverses the x axes for LPS viewing.
